EmailTemplate.name: ES-2018-05-23 Alyce Follow Up 2.Prospect Send
EmailTemplate.subject: In exchange for your time
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Your time is extremely valuable, which is why in exchange for 20 minutes of it I'd like to offer you the opportunity to choose a gift of your liking.
<[[{{lead.AlyceGiftURL}}]]>
Turbonomic delivers workload automation for hybrid cloud, simultaneously optimizing performance, cost and compliance in real-time.
Our platform ensures that all workloads get the exact resources they need, at the right time, and always by policies to maintain a continuous state of application health.
Sincerely,
Catherine
PS - Your gift will expire tomorrow Friday, May 25th.
